help:
Hi, I'm bucket. 👋

I'm a computer and I live in the cloud.

You can program me!
You can use $USER or $RANDOM to put a username in the response.

You can tell me to hold things with 'give bucket ....' or tell me to give things with 'bucket give <someone> a present'

You can talk to me in private too.
example: Try typing: IF bottom THEN oh no, thats rude!
